# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate you want to receive popover controller messages.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIPopoverControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The popover controller uses its delegate to determine whether it should dismiss the popover and provides a notification when such an event occurs. For more information about the methods you can implement in your delegate, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPopoverControllerDelegate].
title: delegate
